tosdr.tldr: Facebook uses, pixels and local storage in order to gather information about you, your device, your browser cache, your use of Facebook.  Facebook also uses cookies for adversing purposes.

E58aPtzP3jk.title: This service tracks you on other websites

tosdr.tldr: This service uses cookies to track you even if you are not interacting with them directly. Amazon for instance, use cookies to track your device and serve targeted advertisements on other websites (Amazon associates, websites using Amazon Checkout). They “obtain certain types of information when your Web browser accesses Amazon.com or advertisements and other content served by or on behalf of Amazon.com on other Web sites”.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

VTlWfubfib4.title: You can give comments before changes

tosdr.tldr: Facebook gives you an opportunity to comment on changes. (In 2012, Facebook changed their terms of service. Before that, you could also vote against the changes (even though the results were not binding unless 30% of the active users voted). Now, there is no vote any more.)

tosdr.case: they state that you own your data
tosdr.tldr: You allow Facebook to use your data, but they explicitly state that you maintain the ownership yourself.

i3Fx2yL3q1g.title: The Android app can record sound & video from your phone, at any time, without your consent

tosdr.case: the (mobile) app of this service requires very broad permissions at install-time
tosdr.tldr: When installing the Facebook app on an Android phone, it allows access to the audio record path and to take pictures with the camera. This allows the application at any time to collect images the camera is seeing.

iB6eKxyNRRU.title: Facebook uses your data for many purposes

tosdr.case: your data is used for many purposes
tosdr.tldr: Including: data analysis, testing, service improvement, control of the effectiveness of the personal ads, and location features and services.

kizrN7qb1Ck.title: Very broad copyright license on your content

tosdr.tldr: The copyright license that you grant to Facebook goes beyond the requirements for operating the service. For instance, it includes the right for Facebook to transfer the license or to license it others on their terms (“sublicense”). Also, the copyright license does not end when you stop using the service unless your content has been deleted by everyone else.

tosdr.case: pseudonym not allowed (not because of user-to-user trust)
tosdr.tldr: You must use your legal name publicly on the service. Using a pseudonym or a pen name is not allowed. This can have negative consequences on the freedom of expression, especially for people who exercise certain professions, or who live in certain countries.

s98UR0Jx6Z4.title: Facebook automatically shares your data with many other services

tosdr.case: many third parties are involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr:
Facebook automatically shares your information with Bing, Pandora, 
TripAdvisor, Yelp, Rotten Tomatoes, Clicker, Scribd, and Docs, unless 
you manually opt-out.
